channel.title: CVE Feed for Smackcoders -- SendGrid for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Smackcoders -- SendGrid for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-9364|2024-10-18T16:36:55.955Z -- smackcoders -- sendgrid%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The SendGrid for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'wp_mailplus_clear_logs' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete the plugin's log files.

item.title: CVE-2024-43965|2024-09-06T16:20:40.447Z -- smackcoders -- sendgrid%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Smackcoders SendGrid for WordPress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects SendGrid for WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-43965|2024-08-29T15:23:12.823Z -- smackcoders -- sendgrid%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Smackcoders SendGrid for WordPress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects SendGrid for WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-9364|2024-10-18T04:32:55.748Z -- smackcoders -- sendgrid%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The SendGrid for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'wp_mailplus_clear_logs' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete the plugin's log files.
